name: Beast Ball
description: A special Poke Ball designed to catch Ultra Beasts. It has a low success rate for catching others.

name: Fast Ball
description: A Poke Ball that makes it easier to catch Pokemon that are usually very quick to run away.

name: Friend Ball
description: A strange Poke Ball that will make the wild Pokemon caught with it more friendly toward you immediately.

name: Great Ball
description: A good, high-performance Poke Ball that provides a higher success rate for catching Pokemon than a standard Poke Ball.

name: Heal Ball
description: A remedial Poke Ball that restores the HP of a Pokemon caught with it and eliminates any status conditions.

name: Heavy Ball
description: A Poke Ball that is better than usual at catching very heavy Pokemon.

name: Level Ball
description: A Poke Ball that makes it easier to catch Pokemon that are at a lower level than your own Pokemon.

name: Love Ball
description: A Poke Ball that works best when catching a Pokemon that is of the opposite gender of your Pokemon.

name: Luxury Ball
description: A particularly comfortable Poke Ball that makes a wild Pokemon quickly grow friendlier after being caught.

name: Master Ball
description: The best Poke Ball with the ultimate level of performance. With it, you will catch any wild Pokemon without fail.

name: Moon Ball
description: A Poke Ball that will make it easier to catch Pokemon that can evolve using a Moon Stone.

name: Nest Ball
description: A somewhat different Poke Ball that becomes more effective the lower the level of the wild Pokemon.

name: Net Ball
description: A somewhat different Poke Ball that is more effective when attempting to catch Water- or Bug-type Pokemon.

name: Poke Ball
description: A device for catching wild Pokemon. It's thrown like a ball at a Pokemon, comfortably encapsulating its target.

name: Quick Ball
description: A somewhat different Poke Ball that has a more successful catch rate if used at the start of a wild encounter.

name: Repeat Ball
description: A somewhat different Poke Ball that works especially well on a Pokemon species that has been caught before.

name: Timer Ball
description: A somewhat different Poke Ball that becomes progressively more effective at catching Pokemon the more turns that are taken in battle.

name: Ultra Ball
description: An ultra-high-performance Poke Ball that provides a higher success rate for catching Pokemon than a Great Ball.

name: Antidote
description: A spray-type medicine for treating poisoning. It can be used to lift the effects of being poisoned from a single Pokemon.

name: Awakening
description: A spray-type medicine to wake the sleeping. It can be used to rouse a single Pokemon from the clutches of sleep.

name: Burn Heal
description: A spray-type medicine for treating burns. It can be used to heal a single Pokemon suffering from a burn.

name: Elixir
description: This medicine can be used to restore 10 PP to each of the moves that have been learned by a Pokemon.

name: Ether
description: This medicine can be used to restore 10 PP to a single selected move that has been learned by a Pokemon.

name: Fresh Water
description: Water with high mineral content. It can be used to restore 30 HP to a single Pokemon.

name: Full Heal
description: A spray-type medicine that is broadly effective. It can be used to heal all the status conditions of a single Pokemon.

name: Full Restore
description: A medicine that can be used to fully restore the HP of a single Pokemon and heal any status conditions it has.

name: Hyper Potion
description: A spray-type medicine for treating wounds. It can be used to restore 120 HP to a single Pokemon.

name: Ice Heal
description: A spray-type medicine for treating freezing. It can be used to thaw out a single Pokemon that has been frozen solid.

name: Lemonade
description: A very sweet and refreshing drink. It can be used to restore 70 HP to a single Pokemon.

name: Max Elixir
description: This medicine can be used to fully restore the PP of all of the moves that have been learned by a Pokemon.

name: Max Ether
description: This medicine can be used to fully restore the PP of a single selected move that has been learned by a Pokemon.

name: Max Potion
description: A spray-type medicine for treating wounds. It can be used to completely restore the max HP of a single Pokemon.

name: Max Revive
description: A medicine that can be used to revive a single Pokemon that has fainted. It also fully restores the Pokemon's max HP.

name: Moomoo Milk
description: A bottle of highly nutritious milk. It can be used to restore 100 HP to a single Pokemon.

name: Paralyze Heal
description: A spray-type medicine for treating paralysis. It can be used to free a single Pokemon that has been paralyzed.

name: Potion
description: A spray-type medicine for treating wounds. It can be used to restore 20 HP to a single Pokemon.

name: Revive
description: null

name: Soda Pop
description: A highly carbonated soda drink. It can be used to restore 50 HP to a single Pokemon.

name: Super Potion
description: A spray-type medicine for treating wounds. It can be used to restore 60 HP to a single Pokemon.

name: Absorb Bulb
description: An item to be held by a Pokemon. It boosts Sp. Atk if the holder is hit with a Water-type attack. It can only be used once.

name: Adamant Orb
description: A brightly gleaming orb to be held by Dialga. It boosts the power of Dragon- and Steel-type moves when it is held.

name: Air Balloon
description: An item to be held by a Pokemon. The holder will float in the air until hit. Once the holder is hit, this item will burst.

name: Amulet Coin
description: null

name: Assault Vest
description: An item to be held by a Pokemon. This offensive vest raises Sp. Def but prevents the use of status moves.

name: Big Root
description: An item to be held by a Pokemon. It boosts the amount of HP the holder restores from HP-stealing moves.

name: Binding Band
description: An item to be held by a Pokemon. It's a band that increases the power of binding moves used by the holder.

name: Black Belt
description: An item to be held by a Pokemon. This belt helps the wearer to focus and boosts the power of Fighting-type moves.

name: Black Glasses
description: An item to be held by a Pokemon. It's a pair of shady-looking glasses that boost the power of Dark-type moves.

name: Black Sludge
description: An item to be held by a Pokemon. It gradually restores HP to Poison-type Pokemon. It damages any other type.

name: Bright Powder
description: An item to be held by a Pokemon. It casts a tricky glare that lowers the opposing Pokemon's accuracy.

name: Bug Gem
description: A gem with an insect-like essence. When held, it strengthens the power of a Bug-type move one time.

name: Cell Battery
description: An item to be held by a Pokemon. It boosts Attack if the holder is hit with an Electric-type attack. It can only be used once.

name: Charcoal
description: An item to be held by a Pokemon. It's a combustible fuel that boosts the power of Fire-type moves.

name: Choice Band
description: An item to be held by a Pokemon. This curious headband boosts Attack but only allows the use of one move.

name: Choice Scarf
description: An item to be held by a Pokemon. This curious scarf boosts Speed but only allows the use of one move.

name: Choice Specs
description: An item to be held by a Pokemon. These curious glasses boost Sp. Atk but only allow the use of one move.

name: Damp Rock
description: An item to be held by a Pokemon. It extends the duration of the move Rain Dance when used by the holder.

name: Dark Gem
description: A gem with an essence of darkness. When held, it strengthens the power of a Dark-type move one time.

name: Deep Sea Scale
description: An item to be held by Clamperl. This scale shines with a faint pink and raises the holder's Sp. Def stat.

name: Deep Sea Tooth
description: An item to be held by Clamperl. This fang gleams a sharp silver and raises the holder's Sp. Atk stat.

name: Destiny Knot
description: An item to be held by a Pokemon. If the holder becomes infatuated, the opposing Pokemon will be, too.

name: Draco Plate
description: An item to be held by a Pokemon. It's a stone tablet that boosts the power of Dragon-type moves.

name: Dragon Fang
description: An item to be held by a Pokemon. This hard and sharp fang boosts the power of Dragon-type moves.

name: Dragon Gem
description: A gem with a draconic essence. When held, it strengthens the power of a Dragon-type move one time.

name: Dread Plate
description: An item to be held by a Pokemon. It's a stone tablet that boosts the power of Dark-type moves.

name: Earth Plate
description: An item to be held by a Pokemon. It's a stone tablet that boosts the power of Ground-type moves.

name: Eject Button
description: An item to be held by a Pokemon. If the holder is hit by an attack, it will be switched out of battle.

name: Eject Pack
description: An item to be held by a Pokemon. When the holder's stats are lowered, it will be switched out of battle.

name: Electric Gem
description: A gem with an essence of electricity. When held, it strengthens the power of an Electric-type move one time.

name: Everstone
description: An item to be held by a Pokemon. A Pokemon holding this peculiar stone is prevented from evolving.

name: Eviolite
description: A mysterious evolutionary lump. When held by a Pokemon that can still evolve, it raises both Defense and Sp. Def.

name: Exp. Share
description: Turning on this special device will allow all the Pokemon on your team to receive Exp. Points from battles.

name: Expert Belt
description: An item to be held by a Pokemon. It's a well-worn belt that slightly boosts the power of supereffective moves.

name: Fairy Gem
description: A gem with an essence of the fey. When held, it strengthens the power of a Fairy-type move one time.

name: Fighting Gem
description: A gem with an essence of combat. When held, it strengthens the power of a Fighting-type move one time.

name: Fire Gem
description: A gem with an essence of fire. When held, it strengthens the power of a Fire-type move one time.

name: Fist Plate
description: An item to be held by a Pokemon. It's a stone tablet that boosts the power of Fighting-type moves.

name: Flame Orb
description: An item to be held by a Pokemon. It's a bizarre orb that will afflict the holder with a burn during battle.

name: Flame Plate
description: An item to be held by a Pokemon. It's a stone tablet that boosts the power of Fire-type moves.

name: Float Stone
description: An item to be held by a Pokemon. This very light stone reduces the weight of a Pokemon when held.

name: Flying Gem
description: A gem with an essence of air. When held, it strengthens the power of a Flying-type move one time.

name: Focus Band
description: An item to be held by a Pokemon. The holder may endure a potential KO attack, leaving it with just 1 HP.

name: Focus Sash
description: An item to be held by a Pokemon. If the holder has full HP, it will endure a potential KO attack with 1 HP. The item then disappears.

name: Full Incense
description: An item to be held by a Pokemon. This exotic-smelling incense makes the holder bloated and slow moving.

name: Ghost Gem
description: A gem with a spectral essence. When held, it strengthens the power of a Ghost-type move one time.

name: Grass Gem
description: A gem with an essence of nature. When held, it strengthens the power of a Grass-type move one time.

name: Grip Claw
description: An item to be held by a Pokemon. It extends the duration of multi-turn attacks, such as Bind and Wrap.

name: Griseous Orb
description: A glowing orb to be held by Giratina. It boosts the power of Dragon- and Ghost-type moves when it is held.

name: Ground Gem
description: A gem with an essence of land. When held, it strengthens the power of a Ground-type move one time.

name: Hard Stone
description: An item to be held by a Pokemon. It's a durable stone that boosts the power of Rock-type moves.

name: Heat Rock
description: An item to be held by a Pokemon. It extends the duration of the move Sunny Day when used by the holder.

name: Ice Gem
description: A gem with an essence of ice. When held, it strengthens the power of an Ice-type move one time.

name: Icicle Plate
description: An item to be held by a Pokemon. It's a stone tablet that boosts the power of Ice-type moves.

name: Icy Rock
description: An item to be held by a Pokemon. It extends the duration of the move Hail when used by the holder.

name: Insect Plate
description: An item to be held by a Pokemon. It's a stone tablet that boosts the power of Bug-type moves.

name: Iron Ball
description: An item to be held by a Pokemon. It lowers Speed and allows Ground-type moves to hit Flying types and holders that are levitating.

name: Iron Plate
description: An item to be held by a Pokemon. It's a stone tablet that boosts the power of Steel-type moves.

name: King's Rock
description: An item to be held by a Pokemon. When the holder successfully inflicts damage, the target may also flinch.

name: Lagging Tail
description: An item to be held by a Pokemon. It is tremendously heavy and makes the holder move slower than usual.

name: Lax Incense
description: An item to be held by a Pokemon. The beguiling aroma of this incense may cause attacks to miss its holder.

name: Leek
description: An item to be held by Farfetch'd. This very long and stiff stalk of leek boosts its critical-hit ratio.

name: Leftovers
description: An item to be held by a Pokemon. The holder's HP is slowly but steadily restored throughout every battle.

name: Life Orb
description: An item to be held by a Pokemon. It boosts the power of moves but at the cost of some HP on each hit.

name: Light Ball
description: An item to be held by Pikachu. It's a puzzling orb that boosts its Attack and Sp. Atk stats.

name: Light Clay
description: An item to be held by a Pokemon. Protective moves like Light Screen and Reflect will be effective longer.

name: Luck Incense
description: An item to be held by a Pokemon. It doubles any prize money received if the holding Pokemon joins a battle.

name: Lucky Egg
description: An item to be held by a Pokemon. It's an egg filled with happiness that earns the holder extra Exp. Points in battle.

name: Lucky Punch
description: An item to be held by Chansey. This pair of lucky boxing gloves will boost Chansey's critical-hit ratio.

name: Luminous Moss
description: An item to be held by a Pokemon. It boosts Sp. Def if the holder is hit with a Water-type attack. It can only be used once.

name: Lustrous Orb
description: A beautifully glowing orb to be held by Palkia. It boosts the power of Dragon- and Water-type moves when it is held.

name: Macho Brace
description: An item to be held by a Pokemon. This stiff, heavy brace helps Pokemon grow strong but cuts Speed in battle.

name: Magnet
description: An item to be held by a Pokemon. It's a powerful magnet that boosts the power of Electric-type moves.

name: Meadow Plate
description: An item to be held by a Pokemon. It's a stone tablet that boosts the power of Grass-type moves.

name: Mental Herb
description: An item to be held by a Pokemon. The holder shakes off move-binding effects to move freely. It can be used only once.

name: Metal Coat
description: An item to be held by a Pokemon. It's a special metallic film that can boost the power of Steel-type moves.

name: Metal Powder
description: An item to be held by Ditto. Extremely fine yet hard, this odd powder boosts the Defense stat.

name: Metronome
description: An item to be held by a Pokemon. It boosts moves used consecutively but only until a different move is used.

name: Mind Plate
description: An item to be held by a Pokemon. It's a stone tablet that boosts the power of Psychic-type moves.

name: Miracle Seed
description: An item to be held by a Pokemon. It's a seed imbued with life-force that boosts the power of Grass-type moves.

name: Muscle Band
description: An item to be held by a Pokemon. This headband exudes strength, slightly boosting the power of physical moves.

name: Mystic Water
description: An item to be held by a Pokemon. This teardrop-shaped gem boosts the power of Water-type moves.

name: Never-Melt Ice
description: An item to be held by a Pokemon. It's a heat- repelling piece of ice that boosts the power of Ice-type moves.

name: Normal Gem
description: A gem with an ordinary essence. When held, it strengthens the power of a Normal-type move one time.

name: Odd Incense
description: An item to be held by a Pokemon. This exotic-smelling incense boosts the power of Psychic-type moves.

name: Pixie Plate
description: An item to be held by a Pokemon. It's a stone tablet that boosts the power of Fairy-type moves.

name: Poison Barb
description: An item to be held by a Pokemon. This small, poisonous barb boosts the power of Poison-type moves.

name: Poison Gem
description: A gem with an essence of poison. When held, it strengthens the power of a Poison-type move one time.

name: Power Anklet
description: An item to be held by a Pokemon. It reduces Speed but allows the holder's Speed stat to grow more after battling.

name: Power Band
description: An item to be held by a Pokemon. It reduces Speed but allows the holder's Sp. Def stat to grow more after battling.

name: Power Belt
description: An item to be held by a Pokemon. It reduces Speed but allows the holder's Defense stat to grow more after battling.

name: Power Bracer
description: An item to be held by a Pokemon. It reduces Speed but allows the holder's Attack stat to grow more after battling.

name: Power Herb
description: A single-use item to be held by a Pokemon. It allows the holder to immediately use a move that normally requires a turn to charge.

name: Power Lens
description: An item to be held by a Pokemon. It reduces Speed but allows the holder's Sp. Atk stat to grow more after battling.

name: Power Weight
description: An item to be held by a Pokemon. It reduces Speed but allows the holder's max HP to grow more after battling.

name: Psychic Gem
description: A gem with an essence of the mind. When held, it strengthens the power of a Psychic-type move one time.

name: Quick Claw
description: An item to be held by a Pokemon. This light, sharp claw lets the bearer move first occasionally.

name: Quick Powder
description: An item to be held by Ditto. Extremely fine yet hard, this odd powder boosts the Speed stat.

name: Razor Claw
description: An item to be held by a Pokemon. This sharply hooked claw increases the holder's critical-hit ratio.

name: Razor Fang
description: An item to be held by a Pokemon. When the holder successfully inflicts damage, the target may also flinch.

name: Red Card
description: An item to be held by a Pokemon. When the holder is hit by an attack, the attacker is removed from battle.

name: Ring Target
description: An item to be held by a Pokemon. Moves that normally have no effect will land on a Pokemon holding it.

name: Rock Gem
description: A gem with an essence of rock. When held, it strengthens the power of a Rock-type move one time.

name: Rock Incense
description: An item to be held by a Pokemon. This exotic-smelling incense boosts the power of Rock-type moves.

name: Electric Seed
description: An item to be held by a Pokemon. It boosts Defense on Electric Terrain. It can only be used once.

name: Grassy Seed
description: An item to be held by a Pokemon. It boosts Defense on Grassy Terrain. It can only be used once.

name: Misty Seed
description: An item to be held by a Pokemon. It boosts Sp. Def on Misty Terrain. It can only be used once.

name: Psychic Seed
description: An item to be held by a Pokemon. It boosts Sp. Def on Psychic Terrain. It can only be used once.

name: Rocky Helmet
description: An item to be held by a Pokemon. If the holder is hit, the attacker will also be damaged upon contact.

name: Rose Incense
description: An item to be held by a Pokemon. This exotic-smelling incense boosts the power of Grass-type moves.

name: Safety Goggles
description: An item to be held by a Pokemon. These goggles protect the holder from both weather-related damage and powder.

name: Scope Lens
description: An item to be held by a Pokemon. It's a lens for scoping out weak points. It boosts the holder's critical-hit ratio.

name: Sea Incense
description: An item to be held by a Pokemon. This incense has a curious aroma that boosts the power of Water-type moves.

name: Sharp Beak
description: An item to be held by a Pokemon. It's a long, sharp beak that boosts the power of Flying-type moves.

name: Shed Shell
description: An item to be held by a Pokemon. This discarded carapace enables the holder to switch out of battle without fail.

name: Shell Bell
description: An item to be held by a Pokemon. The holder restores a little HP every time it inflicts damage on others.

name: Silk Scarf
description: An item to be held by a Pokemon. It's a sumptuous scarf that boosts the power of Normal-type moves.

name: Silver Powder
description: An item to be held by a Pokemon. It's a shiny silver powder that will boost the power of Bug-type moves.

name: Sky Plate
description: An item to be held by a Pokemon. It's a stone tablet that boosts the power of Flying-type moves.

name: Smoke Ball
description: An item to be held by a Pokemon. It enables the holder to flee from any wild Pokemon encounter without fail.

name: Smooth Rock
description: An item to be held by a Pokemon. It extends the duration of the move Sandstorm when used by the holder.

name: Snowball
description: An item to be held by a Pokemon. It boosts Attack if the holder is hit with an Ice-type attack. It can only be used once.

name: Soft Sand
description: An item to be held by a Pokemon. It's a loose, silky sand that boosts the power of Ground-type moves.

name: Soothe Bell
description: An item to be held by a Pokemon. The comforting chime of this bell calms the holder, making it friendly.

name: Soul Dew
description: A wondrous orb to be held by either Latios or Latias. It raises the power of Psychic- and Dragon-type moves.

name: Spell Tag
description: An item to be held by a Pokemon. It's a sinister, eerie tag that boosts the power of Ghost-type moves.

name: Splash Plate
description: An item to be held by a Pokemon. It's a stone tablet that boosts the power of Water-type moves.

name: Spooky Plate
description: An item to be held by a Pokemon. It's a stone tablet that boosts the power of Ghost-type moves.

name: Steel Gem
description: A gem with an essence of steel. When held, it strengthens the power of a Steel-type move one time.

name: Sticky Barb
description: An item to be held by a Pokemon. It damages the holder every turn and may latch on to Pokemon that touch the holder.

name: Stone Plate
description: An item to be held by a Pokemon. It's a stone tablet that boosts the power of Rock-type moves.

name: Terrain Extender
description: An item to be held by a Pokemon. It extends the duration of the terrain caused by the holder's move or Ability.

name: Thick Club
description: An item to be held by a Pokemon. It's a bizarre orb that will badly poison the holder during battle.

name: Toxic Orb
description: An item to be held by a Pokemon. It's a bizarre orb that will badly poison the holder during battle.

name: Toxic Plate
description: An item to be held by a Pokemon. It's a stone tablet that boosts the power of Poison-type moves.

name: Twisted Spoon
description: An item to be held by a Pokemon. This spoon is imbued with telekinetic power and boosts Psychic-type moves.

name: Utility Umbrella
description: An item to be held by a Pokemon. This sturdy umbrella protects the holder from the effects of weather.

name: Water Gem
description: A gem with an essence of water. When held, it strengthens the power of a Water-type move one time.

name: Wave Incense
description: An item to be held by a Pokemon. This incense has a curious aroma that boosts the power of Water-type moves.

name: Weakness Policy
description: An item to be held by a Pokemon. Attack and Sp. Atk sharply increase if the holder is hit with a move it's weak to.

name: White Herb
description: An item to be held by a Pokemon. It will restore any lowered stat in battle. It can be used only once.

name: Wide Lens
description: An item to be held by a Pokemon. It's a magnifying lens that slightly boosts the accuracy of moves.

name: Wise Glasses
description: An item to be held by a Pokemon. This thick pair of glasses slightly boosts the power of special moves.

name: Zap Plate
description: An item to be held by a Pokemon. It's a stone tablet that boosts the power of Electric-type moves.

name: Zoom Lens
description: An item to be held by a Pokemon. If the holder moves after its target moves, its accuracy will be boosted.

name: Hasty Mint
description: When a Pokemon smells this mint, its Speed will grow more easily, but its Defense will grow more slowly.

name: Impish Mint
description: When a Pokemon smells this mint, its Defense will grow more easily, but its Sp. Atk will grow more slowly.

name: Jolly Mint
description: When a Pokemon smells this mint, its Speed will grow more easily, but its Sp. Atk will grow more slowly.

name: Lax Mint
description: When a Pokemon smells this mint, its Defense will grow more easily, but its Sp. Def will grow more slowly.

name: Lonely Mint
description: When a Pokemon smells this mint, its Attack will grow more easily, but its Defense will grow more slowly.

name: Mild Mint
description: When a Pokemon smells this mint, its Sp. Atk will grow more easily, but its Defense will grow more slowly.

name: Modest Mint
description: When a Pokemon smells this mint, its Sp. Atk will grow more easily, but its Attack will grow more slowly.

name: Naive Mint
description: When a Pokemon smells this mint, its Speed will grow more easily, but its Sp. Def will grow more slowly.

name: Naughty Mint
description: When a Pokemon smells this mint, its Attack will grow more easily, but its Sp. Def will grow more slowly.

name: Quiet Mint
description: When a Pokemon smells this mint, its Sp. Atk will grow more easily, but its Speed will grow more slowly.

name: Rash Mint
description: When a Pokemon smells this mint, its Sp. Atk will grow more easily, but its Sp. Def will grow more slowly.

name: Relaxed Mint
description: When a Pokemon smells this mint, its Defense will grow more easily, but its Speed will grow more slowly.

name: Sassy Mint
description: When a Pokemon smells this mint, its Sp. Def will grow more easily, but its Speed will grow more slowly.

name: Serious Mint
description: When a Pokemon smells this mint, all of its stats will grow at an equal rate.

name: Timid Mint
description: When a Pokemon smells this mint, its Speed will grow more easily, but its Attack will grow more slowly.

name: Bold Mint
description: When a Pokemon smells this mint, its Defense will grow more easily, but its Attack will grow more slowly.

name: Brave Mint
description: When a Pokemon smells this mint, its Attack will grow more easily, but its Speed will grow more slowly.

name: Calm Mint
description: When a Pokemon smells this mint, its Sp. Def will grow more easily, but its Attack will grow more slowly.

name: Careful Mint
description: When a Pokemon smells this mint, its Sp. Def will grow more easily, but its Sp. Atk will grow more slowly.

name: Gentle Mint
description: When a Pokemon smells this mint, its Sp. Def will grow more easily, but its Defense will grow more slowly.

name: Adrenaline Orb
description: If held by a Pokemon, it boosts Speed when intimidated.

name: Ability Capsule
description: A capsule that allows a Pokemon with two Abilities to switch between these Abilities when it is used.

name: Adamant Mint
description: When a Pokemon smells this mint, its Attack will grow more easily, but its Sp. Atk will grow more slowly.

name: Genius Feather
description: An item for use on a Pokemon. It slightly increases the Sp. Atk base points of a single Pokemon.

name: Health Feather
description: An item for use on a Pokemon. It slightly increases the HP base points of a single Pokemon.

name: Muscle Feather
description: An item for use on a Pokemon. It slightly increases the Attack base points of a single Pokemon.

name: Resist Feather
description: An item for use on a Pokemon. It slightly increases the Defense base points of a single Pokemon.

name: Clever Feather
description: An item for use on a Pokemon. It slightly increases the Sp. Def base points of a single Pokemon.

name: Swift Feather
description: An item for use on a Pokemon. It slightly increases the Speed base points of a single Pokemon.

name: HP Up
description: A nutritious drink for Pokemon. When consumed, it raises the HP base points of a single Pokemon.

name: Iron
description: A nutritious drink for Pokemon. When consumed, it raises the Defense base points of a single Pokemon.

name: PP Max
description: A medicine that optimally raises the max PP of a single selected move that has been learned by a Pokemon.

name: PP Up
description: A medicine that slightly raises the max PP of a single selected move that has been learned by a Pokemon.

name: Protein
description: A nutritious drink for Pokemon. When consumed, it raises the Attack base points of a single Pokemon.

name: Zinc
description: A nutritious drink for Pokemon. When consumed, it raises the Sp. Def base points of a single Pokemon.

name: Calcium
description: null

name: Carbos
description: A nutritious drink for Pokemon. When consumed, it raises the Speed base points of a single Pokemon.

name: Rare Candy
description: A candy that is packed with energy. When consumed, it will instantly raise the level of a single Pokemon by one.

name: Dire Hit
description: An item that greatly raises the critical-hit ratio of a Pokemon during a battle. It can be used only once and wears off if the Pokemon is withdrawn.

name: Guard Spec.
description: An item that prevents stat reduction among the Trainer's party Pokemon for five turns after it is used in battle.

name: X Accuracy
description: An item that sharply boosts the accuracy of a Pokemon during a battle. It wears off once the Pokemon is withdrawn.

name: X Attack
description: An item that sharply boosts the Attack stat of a Pokemon during a battle. It wears off once the Pokemon is withdrawn.

name: X Defense
description: An item that sharply boosts the Defense stat of a Pokemon during a battle. It wears off once the Pokemon is withdrawn.

name: X Sp. Atk
description: An item that sharply boosts the Sp. Atk stat of a Pokemon during a battle. It wears off once the Pokemon is withdrawn.

name: X Sp. Def
description: An item that sharply boosts the Sp. Def stat of a Pokemon during a battle. It wears off once the Pokemon is withdrawn.

name: X Speed
description: An item that sharply boosts the Speed stat of a Pokemon during a battle. It wears off once the Pokemon is withdrawn.
